LanguageData.VQEA_AncientBroadcastingStation.label: ancient broadcasting station
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientBroadcastingStation.descript: An old communications console used to transmit encrypted signals between ancient facilities. Can be used to intercept broadcasts and trace their origin.
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientBroadcastingStation_Off.desc: An old communications console used to transmit encrypted signals between ancient facilities. Seems that whatever information it stored is long gone.
